title: Progress and challenges in nitrous oxide decomposition and valorization
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,8379-8423
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00919J, Review Article
Xuanhao Wu, Jiaxin Du, Yanxia Gao, Haiqiang Wang, Changbin Zhang, Runduo Zhang, Hong He, Gaoqing (Max) Lu, Zhongbiao Wu
In this review, we consolidate and update recently developed advanced nanomaterials and uncovered reaction mechanisms of different N2O abatement technologies.
